activities: Tri-Pen Management Corporation is an outsourced travel management organization that manages corporate travel policies, Our sole mission is to maximize corporate savings in the T&E area to insure your travel suppliers are providing the most efficient, cost effective travel services consistent with your corporate culture.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Corporations are encouraged to raise any complaints they may have with Tri-Pen Management Corporation before proceeding to independent recourse mechanisms.Our data privacy process is covered in detail in our Non-Disclosure agreement and our software services agreement. In both cases dispute resolution is covered in detail including a specific governing body that would be used should the need be necessary. We have established eligibility requirements set forth by our organization and a specific recourse mechanism. Our agreements provide information that includes notice about the mechanism's privacy practices, in conformity with the Safe Harbor Principles.
